resourceTemplates.name: retrieve-task-run
resourceTemplates.title: Retrieve task run
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves run status by run_id. Use /result for final output.

resourceTemplates.name: retrieve-task-run-input
resourceTemplates.title: Retrieve task run input
resourceTemplates.description: Gets the input payload of a run by run_id.

resourceTemplates.name: retrieve-task-run-result
resourceTemplates.title: Retrieve task run result
resourceTemplates.description: Blocks until completion and returns the run result by run_id.

resourceTemplates.name: stream-task-run-events
resourceTemplates.title: Stream task run events
resourceTemplates.description: Streams progress events and state updates for a run.

resourceTemplates.name: retrieve-task-group
resourceTemplates.title: Retrieve task group
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves aggregated status across all runs in a TaskGroup.

resourceTemplates.name: fetch-task-group-runs
resourceTemplates.title: Fetch task group runs
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves task runs in a TaskGroup, optionally including inputs and outputs.

resourceTemplates.name: stream-task-group-events
resourceTemplates.title: Stream task group events
resourceTemplates.description: Streams TaskGroup events such as status updates and run completions.

resourceTemplates.name: retrieve-task-group-run
resourceTemplates.title: Retrieve task group run
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves run status within a TaskGroup by run_id. Equivalent to /tasks/runs/{run_id}.
